heading: 1 Account Policies
response:
```bash
#!/bin/bash

# Audit

# Check for root login
if [[ $(grep "PermitRootLogin" /etc/ssh/sshd_config | awk '{print $2}') == "yes" ]]; then
  echo "Root login is enabled."
  echo "Remediation required: Disable root login."
else
  echo "Root login is disabled."
fi

# Check for password authentication
if [[ $(grep "PasswordAuthentication" /etc/ssh/sshd_config | awk '{print $2}') == "yes" ]]; then
  echo "Password authentication is enabled."
  echo "Remediation required: Disable password authentication."
else
  echo "Password authentication is disabled."
fi

# Check for minimum password length
if [[ $(grep "PasswordMinLength" /etc/login.defs | awk '{print $2}') -lt 8 ]]; then
  echo "Minimum password length is less than 8 characters."
  echo "Remediation required: Set minimum password length to at least 8 characters."
else
  echo "Minimum password length is at least 8 characters."
fi

# Check for password complexity
if [[ $(grep "PasswordMinComplexity" /etc/login.defs | awk '{print $2}') == "0" ]]; then
  echo "Password complexity is not enforced."
  echo "Remediation required: Enable password complexity requirements."
else
  echo "Password complexity is enforced."
fi

# Check for password age
if [[ $(grep "PasswordAging" /etc/login.defs | awk '{print $2}') == "no" ]]; then
  echo "Password aging is not enforced."
  echo "Remediation required: Enable password aging."
else
  echo "Password aging is enforced."
fi

# Check for account lockout
if [[ $(grep "AccountLock" /etc/login.defs | awk '{print $2}') == "no" ]]; then
  echo "Account lockout is not enforced."
  echo "Remediation required: Enable account lockout."
else
  echo "Account lockout is enforced."
fi

# Check for account inactivity
if [[ $(grep "Inactivity" /etc/login.defs | awk '{print $2}') == "no" ]]; then
  echo "Account inactivity is not enforced."
  echo "Remediation required: Enable account inactivity."
else
  echo "Account inactivity is enforced."
fi

# Check for user account creation restrictions
if [[ $(grep "Useradd" /etc/login.defs | awk '{print $2}') == "yes" ]]; then
  echo "User account creation is restricted."
else
  echo "User account creation is not restricted."
fi

# Check for user account expiration
if [[ $(grep "Expire" /etc/login.defs | awk '{print $2}') == "no" ]]; then
  echo "User account expiration is not enforced."
  echo "Remediation required: Enable user account expiration."
else
  echo "User account expiration is enforced."
fi

# Check for user account UID range
if [[ $(grep "UID_MIN" /etc/login.defs | awk '{print $2}') -lt 1000 ]]; then
  echo "User account UID range is less than 1000."
  echo "Remediation required: Set user account UID range to at least 1000."
else
  echo "User account UID range is at least 1000."
fi

# Remediation
# ... (Edit /etc/ssh/sshd_config, /etc/login.defs, etc. as needed)

# Verification
# ... (Re-run audit script to verify changes)
```
